basics.name: Mohan Bikram KC
basics.summary: Computer Engineering student at Gandaki College of Engineering and Science with hands-on experience in Python development, backend services, and AI-driven solutions. Specialized in Django, Celery, RESTful APIs, and machine learning applications.

work.summary: Developed modules for live engagement and performance analysis. Developed chat analysis and spam detection models for real-time live-streaming moderation. Designed backend APIs and streaming logic for the live streaming app.
highlights: Developed modules for live engagement and performance analysis
Developed chat analysis and spam detection models for real-time live-streaming moderation
Designed backend APIs and streaming logic for the live streaming apps

work.summary: Contributed to backend development using Python frameworks. Integrated Generative AI capabilities into existing product pipelines. Developed automation scripts to streamline internal workflow.
highlights: Contributed to backend development using Python frameworks
Integrated Generative AI capabilities into existing product pipelines
Developed automation scripts to streamline internal workflows

education.institution: Gandaki College of Engineering and Science
